snippet.title: High Noon Drifter - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
High Noon Drifter is a GZDoom weaponset where you play as a gunslinger that's stuck around for a little longer than the end of the wild west era. The weapons and overall tone is relatively low-tech, complimenting more natural-style mapsets for roaming around castles, ruins, and other assorted gothic setpieces. You make use of some ordinary guns that any joe could scrounge up, a handful of antiquated pieces, and a couple dark artifacts in a quest to dispense frontier justice to an ethereal threat.
If you've been craving a "Weird West" sort of weaponset, or even more of an adventurer-type rather than a soldier using military tech, hopefully this'll be up your alley.

https://forum.zdoom.org/viewtopic.php?f=43&t=57098 - Forum topic.
https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B4p2zWkJEFFtY0ttNVUzOHI0Z00/view?usp=sharing - Download link.

Music used (in order):
Timesplitters 2 - Wild West
Trigun: Badlands Rumble - A Grain of Sand in Sandwich

Maps used (in order):
Fistful of Doom - Map01 (Edited)
Fistful of Doom - Map02 (Edited)
Boothill - Map01 (Edited)
Vae Victus - Map01
Epic - Map01
Strange Aeons - E1M1
RYLAYEH - Map01
Scythe 2 - Map01
Japanese Community Project - Map28
The Ultimate Torment n' Torture - Map01
Memento Mori 2 - Map06
Jade Earth - Map01
Whitemare 2 - Map17
ZPack - E3M1
Karnak Temple - Map31
Whitemare 2 - Map10
Ancient Aliens - Map04
Null Space - Map01
The Revolution! - Map04
Memento Mori 2 - Map02
Vae Victus 2 - Map03
Dissolution - Map03
Scythe 3 - Map30
Zone300 - Map15
